mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE(NOTICE_CODE, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_ENROLLDATE, NOTICE_DELETEDATE, NOTICE_STATUS, NOTICE_COUNT, MEMBER_CODE) VALUES(SEQ_NOTICE_NOTICE_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, SYSDATE, NULL, 0, 0, #{adminCode})

INSERT INTO FILES(FILES_CODE, FILES_BOARDTYPE, FILES_ORIGINNAME, FILES_NAME, FILES_ENROLLDATE, FILES_STATUS, FILES_DELETEDATE, PR_CODE) VALUES(SEQ_FILES_FILES_CODE.NEXTVAL, 3, #{originFileName}, #{changeName}, SYSDATE, 0, NULL, SEQ_PR_PR_CODE.CURRVAL)

INSERT INTO PR (PR_CODE, PR_COMPANY, PR_TITLE, PR_LINK, PR_ORDER, PR_TYPE, PR_CONTRACTMONEY, CATEGORY_CODE, PR_STATUS) VALUES(SEQ_PR_PR_CODE.NEXTVAL, #{b.pr_Company}, #{b.pr_Title}, #{b.pr_Link}, 0, 1, #{b.pr_Contractmoney}, #{b.category_Code},0)

INSERT INTO FILES(FILES_CODE, FILES_BOARDTYPE, FILES_ORIGINNAME, FILES_NAME, FILES_ENROLLDATE, FILES_STATUS, FILES_DELETEDATE, PR_CODE) VALUES(SEQ_FILES_FILES_CODE.NEXTVAL, 3, #{originFileName}, #{changeName}, SYSDATE, 0, NULL, SEQ_PR_PR_CODE.CURRVAL)
INSERT INTO REWARD (REWARD_CODE, REWARD_TYPE, REWARD_STATUS, REWARD_ISSUEDATE, STUDYGROUP_CODE) VALUES(SEQ_REWARD_REWARD_CODE.NEXTVAL,1,1,SYSDATE,#{code})
mapper.update: UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = 3 WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{code}
UPDATE BLOCK SET BLOCK_STATUS = 1 WHERE BLOCK_CODE = #{code}
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = 0 WHERE MEMBER_CODE = (SELECT B.MEMBER_CODE FROM BLOCK B WHERE BLOCK_CODE=#{code})
UPDATE MEMBER SET MEMBER_STATUS = 1 WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{code}
UPDATE NOTICE SET NOTICE_STATUS=1, NOTICE_DELETEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE NOTICE_CODE = #{code}
UPDATE GROUPBOARD SET GROUPBOARD_STATUS = 2 WHERE GROUPBOARD_CODE = #{code}
UPDATE PR SET PR_TITLE = #{b.pr_Title}, PR_LINK = #{b.pr_Link} , PR_CONTRACTMONEY = #{b.pr_Contractmoney} WHERE PR_CODE = #{b.pr_Code}
UPDATE FILES SET FILES_ORIGINNAME = #{originFileName}, FILES_NAME = #{changeName} WHERE PR_CODE = #{b.pr_Code}
UPDATE PR SET PR_TITLE = #{b.pr_Title}, PR_LINK = #{b.pr_Link} , PR_CONTRACTMONEY = #{b.pr_Contractmoney} WHERE PR_CODE = #{b.pr_Code}
UPDATE FILES SET FILES_ORIGINNAME = #{originFileName}, FILES_NAME = #{changeName} WHERE PR_CODE = #{b.pr_Code}
UPDATE REWARD SET REWARD_STATUS = 1 , REWARD_ISSUEDATE = SYSDATE WHERE REWARD_CODE = #{code}
UPDATE PR SET PR_STATUS = 2 WHERE PR_CODE = #{code}
mapper.select: SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_STATUS, B.BLOCK_CODE, B.BLOCK_STARTDATE, B.BLOCK_ENDDATE, B.BLOCK_REASON, B.BLOCK_STATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN BLOCK B ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE M.MEMBER_STATUS = 3 AND B.BLOCK_ENDDATE > SYSDATE AND B.ROWID in (SELECT MIN(B.ROWID) from BLOCK B group by B.MEMBER_CODE)

SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_STATUS, B.BLOCK_CODE, B.BLOCK_STARTDATE, B.BLOCK_ENDDATE, B.BLOCK_REASON, B.BLOCK_STATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN BLOCK B ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE M.MEMBER_STATUS = 3 AND SYSDATE > B.BLOCK_ENDDATE AND BLOCK_STATUS = 0

SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_STATUS, B.BLOCK_CODE, TO_CHAR(B.BLOCK_STARTDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS BLOCK_STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(B.BLOCK_ENDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS BLOCK_ENDDATE, B.BLOCK_REASON, DECODE(B.BLOCK_STATUS, 0, '제재', 1, '만료') BLOCK_STATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN BLOCK B ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_STATUS, B.BLOCK_CODE, TO_CHAR(B.BLOCK_STARTDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS BLOCK_STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(B.BLOCK_ENDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS BLOCK_ENDDATE, B.BLOCK_REASON, DECODE(B.BLOCK_STATUS, 0, '제재', 1, '만료') BLOCK_STATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN BLOCK B ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE M.MEMBER_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_STATUS, B.BLOCK_CODE, TO_CHAR(B.BLOCK_STARTDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS BLOCK_STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(B.BLOCK_ENDDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd') AS BLOCK_ENDDATE, B.BLOCK_REASON, DECODE(B.BLOCK_STATUS, 0, '제재', 1, '만료') BLOCK_STATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN BLOCK B ON(M.MEMBER_CODE = B.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE B.BLOCK_REASON LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_GENDER, M.MEMBER_STATUS, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_SMSCONFIRMATION, M.MEMBER_JOB , L.LOGINRECORD_DATE FROM MEMBER M JOIN LOGINRECORD L ON (M.MEMBER_CODE = L.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE M.MEMBER_STATUS = 0 AND (SYSDATE - L.LOGINRECORD_DATE) > 90

SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_GENDER, M.MEMBER_PHONE, M.MEMBER_SMSCONFIRMATION, TO_CHAR(L.LOGINRECORD_DATE,'YYYYMMDD') AS LOGINRECORD_DATE, M.MEMBER_STATUS FROM MEMBER M JOIN LOGINRECORD L ON (M.MEMBER_CODE = L.MEMBER_CODE) WHERE 1= 1
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND M.MEMBER_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MEMBER M WHERE M.MEMBER_STATUS = 1
AND M.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'
AND M.MEMBER_CODE LIKE '%' || #{keyword} || '%'

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 0
AND NOTICE_CODE LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'

SELECT * FROM NOTICE N WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 0
AND NOTICE_CODE LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
AND NOTICE_TITLE LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
ORDER BY NOTICE_CODE DESC

SELECT SUM(NUM) FROM ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS NUM FROM GROUPBOARD WHERE 1=1
AND GROUPBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
AND MEMBER_CODE LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
UNION ALL SELECT COUNT(*)AS NUM FROM REPLY WHERE 1=1
)
AND REPLY_CONTENT LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%')
AND MEMBER_CODE LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%' )

SELECT code, member, content, post, type , boardCode, nick ,groupName , status, board from (SELECT G.GROUPBOARD_CODE as code,G.MEMBER_CODE as member, G.GROUPBOARD_CONTENT as content, TO_CHAR(G.GROUPBOARD_POSTDATE,'yyyymmdd') as post, '그룹' as type , G.STUDYGROUP_CODE as boardCode, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME as nick, SG.STUDYGROUP_NAME as groupName, g.groupboard_status as status ,g.groupboard_type as board FROM GROUPBOARD G JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_CODE = G.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN STUDYGROUP SG ON (SG.STUDYGROUP_CODE = G.STUDYGROUP_CODE) WHERE 1=1
AND G.MEMBER_CODE = #{keyword}
AND G.GROUPBOARD_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%'
UNION ALL SELECT R.REPLY_CODE as code,R.MEMBER_CODE as member, R.REPLY_CONTENT as content, TO_CHAR(R.REPLY_DATE,'yyyymmdd') as post, '리플' as type, R.GROUPBOARD_CODE as boardCode, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME as nick, SG.STUDYGROUP_NAME as groupName, g.groupboard_status as status ,g.groupboard_type as board FROM REPLY R JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_CODE = R.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN GROUPBOARD G ON (R.GROUPBOARD_CODE = G.GROUPBOARD_CODE) JOIN STUDYGROUP SG ON (SG.STUDYGROUP_CODE = g.studygroup_code) WHERE 1=1
)
AND R.MEMBER_CODE = #{keyword})
AND R.REPLY_CONTENT LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

SELECT PR_CODE,PR_COMPANY,PR_TITLE,PR_LINK,PR_ORDER,PR_TYPE, PR_CONTRACTMONEY,CATEGORY_CODE, PR_STATUS, TO_CHAR(PR_STARTDATE,'yyyymmdd') as PR_STARTDATE, TO_CHAR(PR_ENDDATE,'yyyymmdd') as PR_ENDDATE, FILES_CODE,FILES_BOARDTYPE,FILES_ORIGINNAME,FILES_NAME, FILES_ENROLLDATE,FILES_STATUS,FILES_DELETEDATE FROM PR JOIN FILES USING(PR_CODE)

SELECT PR_CODE,PR_COMPANY,PR_TITLE,PR_LINK,PR_ORDER,PR_TYPE, PR_CONTRACTMONEY,CATEGORY_CODE, PR_STATUS, PR_STARTDATE, PR_ENDDATE, FILES_CODE,FILES_BOARDTYPE,FILES_ORIGINNAME,FILES_NAME, FILES_ENROLLDATE,FILES_STATUS,FILES_DELETEDATE FROM PR JOIN FILES USING(PR_CODE) WHERE PR_CODE = #{prCode}
SELECT count(*) FROM REWARD WHERE REWARD_TYPE=0 AND REWARD_STATUS=0 AND MEMBER_CODE IS NOT NULL

SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_JOB, MEMBER_PHONE, REWARD_APPDATE, REWARD_STATUS,REWARD_CODE, NEEDLEVEL_LEVEL, CATEGORY_NAME FROM( SELECT MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_JOB, MEMBER_PHONE, REWARD_APPDATE, REWARD_CODE,REWARD_STATUS, NEEDLEVEL_LEVEL, LISTAGG(CATEGORY_NAME,',') within group (order by REWARD_APPDATE) OVER (PARTITION BY MEMBER_CODE) AS CATEGORY_NAME FROM( SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, M.MEMBER_AGE, M.MEMBER_JOB, M.MEMBER_PHONE,R.REWARD_APPDATE, R.REWARD_STATUS,R.REWARD_CODE, NL.NEEDLEVEL_LEVEL, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN INTERESTCATEGORY IC ON (M.MEMBER_CODE = IC.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN CATEGORY C ON (IC.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN REWARD R ON (M.MEMBER_CODE = R.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN NEED N ON (N.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN NEEDLEVEL NL ON (N.NEEDLEVEL_CODE = NL.NEEDLEVEL_CODE) WHERE R.REWARD_STATUS = 0 AND R.REWARD_TYPE = 0 AND M.MEMBER_CODE IS NOT NULL))

SELECT count(*) FROM REWARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE REWARD_TYPE=0 AND REWARD_STATUS=1
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'

SELECT DISTINCT MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_JOB, MEMBER_PHONE, TO_CHAR(REWARD_ISSUEDATE,'yyyymmdd') as REWARD_ISSUEDATE, REWARD_STATUS,REWARD_CODE, NEEDLEVEL_LEVEL, CATEGORY_NAME FROM( SELECT MEMBER_CODE , MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NICKNAME, MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, MEMBER_AGE, MEMBER_JOB, MEMBER_PHONE, REWARD_ISSUEDATE, REWARD_CODE,REWARD_STATUS, NEEDLEVEL_LEVEL, LISTAGG(CATEGORY_NAME,',') within group (order by REWARD_ISSUEDATE) OVER (PARTITION BY MEMBER_CODE) AS CATEGORY_NAME FROM( SELECT M.MEMBER_CODE, M.MEMBER_ID, M.MEMBER_NICKNAME, M.MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, M.MEMBER_AGE, M.MEMBER_JOB, M.MEMBER_PHONE,R.REWARD_ISSUEDATE, R.REWARD_STATUS,R.REWARD_CODE, NL.NEEDLEVEL_LEVEL, C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM MEMBER M JOIN INTERESTCATEGORY IC ON (M.MEMBER_CODE = IC.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN CATEGORY C ON (IC.CATEGORY_CODE = C.CATEGORY_CODE) JOIN REWARD R ON (M.MEMBER_CODE = R.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN NEED N ON (N.MEMBER_CODE = M.MEMBER_CODE) JOIN NEEDLEVEL NL ON (N.NEEDLEVEL_CODE = NL.NEEDLEVEL_CODE) WHERE R.REWARD_STATUS = 1 AND R.REWARD_TYPE = 0 AND M.MEMBER_CODE IS NOT NULL AND 1=1
))
AND MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%' ))
AND MEMBER_NICKNAME LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'))

SELECT pr.PR_CODE, pr.PR_LINK, pr.CATEGORY_CODE, pr.PR_STATUS, f.FILES_NAME FROM PR pr LEFT JOIN FILES f ON(pr.PR_CODE = f.PR_CODE) WHERE CATEGORY_CODE IN(SELECT CATEGORY_CODE FROM INTERESTCATEGORY WHERE MEMBER_CODE = (SELECT MEMBER_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_CODE = #{member_Code})) AND pr.PR_STATUS = 0 AND pr.PR_TYPE = 1
AND ROWNUM <= 2
AND f.FILES_STATUS = 0 AND f.FILES_ORDER = 0

SELECT MONTH_ST, MONTH_END, STUDYGROUP_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME, GR_MONTH_TOTAL, RK, STUDYGROUP_NAME,STUDYGROUP_STDATE, STUDYGROUP_GOALTIME,REWARD_STATUS FROM ( SELECT MONTH_ST, MONTH_END, STUDYGROUP_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME, GR_MONTH_TOTAL, RANK() OVER (PARTITION BY CATEGORY_NAME ORDER BY GR_MONTH_TOTAL DESC) AS "RK",STUDYGROUP_NAME,STUDYGROUP_STDATE,STUDYGROUP_GOALTIME,NVL(REWARD_STATUS, 0 ) REWARD_STATUS FROM ( SELECT STUDYGROUP_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME, SUM(STUDYTIME_STUDYTIME) AS "GR_MONTH_TOTAL" ,STUDYGROUP_NAME ,STUDYGROUP_STDATE,STUDYGROUP_GOALTIME , REWARD_STATUS FROM STUDYTIME JOIN STUDYGROUP USING(STUDYGROUP_CODE) LEFT JOIN REWARD USING(STUDYGROUP_CODE) JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE STUDYTIME_DIVISION = 1 AND STUDYTIME_DATE BETWEEN TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),-1), 'YYYYMMDD') AND TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE),-1), 'YYYYMMDD') GROUP BY STUDYGROUP_CODE, CATEGORY_NAME,STUDYGROUP_NAME,STUDYGROUP_STDATE,STUDYGROUP_GOALTIME,REWARD_STATUS), ( SELECT TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'MM'),-1), 'YYYYMMDD') "MONTH_ST", TO_CHAR(ADD_MONTHS(LAST_DAY(SYSDATE),-1), 'YYYYMMDD') "MONTH_END" FROM DUAL )) WHERE RK <=3

SELECT STUDYGROUP_CODE, TO_CHAR(REWARD_ISSUEDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')as REWARD_ISSUEDATE, STUDYGROUP_NAME, TO_CHAR(STUDYGROUP_STDATE,'yyyy-mm-dd')as STUDYGROUP_STDATE, STUDYGROUP_GOALTIME, CATEGORY_NAME, MEMBER_NICKNAME FROM STUDYGROUP JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) JOIN REWARD USING(STUDYGROUP_CODE) JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_CODE) WHERE 1=1
AND STUDYGROUP_CODE LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
AND STUDYGROUP_NAME LIKE '%' ||#{keyword}|| '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM( SELECT MEMBER_ID FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ENROLLDATE > SYSDATE-1)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM( SELECT MEMBER_CODE FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_STATUS = 3)
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM( SELECT MEMBER_CODE FROM MEMBER)

SELECT NVL(sum(countM ),0) AS COUNT ,CATEGORY_NAME from ( SELECT NVL(COUNT(MEMBER_CODE ),0) as countM , C.CATEGORY_NAME FROM INTERESTCATEGORY I JOIN CATEGORY C USING ( CATEGORY_CODE ) GROUP BY C.CATEGORY_NAME UNION SELECT 0,CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY) group by CATEGORY_NAME

SELECT COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '01', 1)) jan, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '02', 1)) feb, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '03', 1)) mar, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '04', 1)) apr, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '05', 1)) may, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '06', 1)) june, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '07', 1)) jul, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '08', 1)) aug, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '09', 1)) sep, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '10', 1)) oct, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '11', 1)) nov, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '12', 1)) dec, COUNT(*) "전체" FROM MEMBER WHERE TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM') >= '01' AND TO_CHAR(MEMBER_ENROLLDATE, 'MM') <='12'
SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM( SELECT STUDYGROUP_CODE FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE STUDYGROUP_STDATE > SYSDATE-1)
SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM( SELECT STUDYGROUP_CODE FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE STUDYGROUP_EDDATE > SYSDATE-1)
SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM( SELECT STUDYGROUP_CODE FROM STUDYGROUP WHERE (STUDYGROUP_EDDATE IS NULL))

SELECT MAX(NVL(COUNT(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 1, '고입')),0))AS GOIP, MAX(NVL(COUNT(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 2, '대입')),0))AS DAEIP, MAX(NVL(COUNT(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 3, '고시')),0))AS GOSI, MAX(NVL(COUNT(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 4, '공시')),0))AS GONGSI, MAX(NVL(COUNT(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 5, '외국어')),0))AS FOREIGN, MAX(NVL(COUNT(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 6, '취준')),0))AS CHIJUN, MAX(NVL(COUNT(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 7, '자격증')),0))AS JAGUK, MAX(NVL(COUNT(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 8, '기타')),0))AS GUITAR FROM STUDYGROUP GROUP BY CATEGORY_CODE
SELECT COUNT(*) as board FROM GROUPBOARD WHERE (GROUPBOARD_POSTDATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE) UNION SELECT COUNT(*) as reply FROM REPLY WHERE REPLY_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS group_female FROM JOINGROUP JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_GENDER LIKE 'F' UNION SELECT COUNT(*) as total_female FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_GENDER LIKE 'F'
SELECT COUNT(*) AS group_male FROM JOINGROUP JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_CODE) WHERE MEMBER_GENDER LIKE 'M' UNION SELECT COUNT(*) as total_male FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_GENDER LIKE 'M'
SELECT SUM(PR_CONTRACTMONEY) as thismonth FROM PR JOIN FILES USING(PR_CODE) WHERE FILES_ENROLLDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate,'MM') AND SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM PR WHERE PR_STATUS = 0
SELECT SUM(PR_CONTRACTMONEY) AS TOTAL FROM PR

SELECT NVL(SUM(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 1, PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0) as GOIP, NVL(SUM(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 2, PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0) as DAEIP, NVL(SUM(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 3, PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0) as GOSI, NVL(SUM(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 4, PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0) as GONGSI, NVL(SUM(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 5, PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0) as FOREIGN, NVL(SUM(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 6, PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0) as CHIJUN, NVL(SUM(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 7, PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0) as JAGUK, NVL(SUM(DECODE(CATEGORY_CODE, 8, PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0) as GUITAR FROM PR JOIN FILES USING(PR_CODE) WHERE FILES_ENROLLDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate,'YY') AND SYSDATE

SELECT NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '01', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as jan, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '02', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as feb, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '03', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as mar, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '04', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as apr, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '05', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as may, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '06', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as june, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '07', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as jul, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '08', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as aug, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '09', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as sep, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '10', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as oct, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '11', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as nov, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '12', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as dec FROM PR JOIN FILES USING(PR_CODE) WHERE PR_TYPE=0 AND FILES_ENROLLDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate,'YY') AND SYSDATE UNION ALL SELECT NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '01', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as jan, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '02', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as feb, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '03', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as mar, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '04', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as apr, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '05', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as may, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '06', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as june, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '07', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as jul, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '08', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as aug, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '09', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as sep, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '10', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as oct, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '11', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as nov, NVL(SUM(DECODE(TO_CHAR(FILES_ENROLLDATE, 'MM'), '12', PR_CONTRACTMONEY)),0)as dec FROM PR JOIN FILES USING(PR_CODE) WHERE PR_TYPE=1 AND FILES_ENROLLDATE BETWEEN TRUNC(sysdate,'YY') AND SYSDATE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM LOGINRECORD WHERE SYSDATE-1 LIKE LOGINRECORD_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM LOGINRECORD WHERE SYSDATE LIKE LOGINRECORD_DATE
SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT FROM LOGINRECORD

SELECT COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'01',1)) as one, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'02',1)) as two, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'03',1)) as three, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'04',1)) as four, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'05',1)) as five, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'06',1)) as six, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'07',1)) as seven, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'08',1)) as eight, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'09',1)) as nine, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'10',1)) as ten, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'11',1)) as eleven, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'12',1)) as twelve, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'13',1)) as thirteen, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'14',1)) as fourteen, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'15',1)) as fifteen, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'16',1)) as sixteen, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'17',1)) as seventeen, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'18',1)) as eighteen, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'18',1)) as nineteen, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'20',1)) as twenty, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'21',1)) as twentyone, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'22',1)) as twentytwo, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'23',1)) as twentythree, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'HH24'),'00',1)) as twentyfour FROM LOGINRECORD WHERE LOGINRECORD_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE

SELECT COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'DY'), '월', 1)) as mon, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'DY'), '화', 1)) as tue, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'DY'), '수', 1)) as wed, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'DY'), '목', 1)) as thur, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'DY'), '금', 1)) as fri, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'DY'), '토', 1)) as sat, COUNT(DECODE(TO_CHAR(LOGINRECORD_DATE, 'DY'), '일', 1)) as sun FROM LOGINRECORD WHERE LOGINRECORD_DATE BETWEEN SYSDATE-7 AND SYSDATE
SELECT NOTICE_CODE,NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, NOTICE_ENROLLDATE,NOTICE_DELETEDATE,NOTICE_STATUS,NOTICE_COUNT FROM NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_CODE= #{noticeCode}
